block.p: WRIGHT-Julia. On February 6, 1998. Beloved wife of the late James. Beloved mother of Judy Levine, Richard, and the late James Jr. Also survived by five grandchildren and eight great grandchildren. Family will receive friends at the John J. Fox Funeral Home, 2080 Boston Post Rd., Larchmont, NY on Monday, 2-4 and 7-9 PM. Funeral service on Tuesday, 10 AM at the funeral home. Interment to follow at Mt. Hope Cemetery, Hastings-on-Hudson, NY. In lieu of flowers, donations to Dominican Sisters of Hope, 320 Powell Ave., Newburgh, NY 12550.

WRIGHT-Julia. On February 6, 1998. Beloved wife of the late James. Beloved mother of Judy Levine, Richard, and the late James Jr. Also survived by five grandchildren and eight great grandchildren. Family will receive friends at the John J. Fox Funeral Home, 2080 Boston Post Rd., Larchmont, NY on Monday, 2-4 and 7-9 PM. Funeral service on Tuesday, 10 AM at the funeral home. Interment to follow at Mt. Hope Cemetery, Hastings-on-Hudson, NY. In lieu of flowers, donations to Dominican Sisters of Hope, 320 Powell Ave., Newburgh, NY 12550.
